name: Windows - Opening
data: This is just a quick call and we're not selling or signing you up for anything.
We've got great news for you. We are offering a no cost no obligation appointment.

We're from (Buyer's name) and we've been in the community for over (years in the script) and we're giving back to the community by giving them a free inspection of the windows to make sure that everybody's safe for the winter.
When we check some of your neighbor's, we found out that it's foggy, can easily break in so we gave them a free no cost consultation as well at their most convenient time.
